Container.Name: NetConnMon
Container.Overview:
NetConnMon is an app that can monitor your network connections and take note of when they go up or down. It can email you when things change.
You configure the types (ICMP, TCP or UPD) connection tests that you desire, their timings, etc. from a browser configuration UI.

Config.Name: sqlite db file folder
Config.Description: The path to the share or appdata folder for saving the sqlite db file that drives your test configurations, email settings, and events. Small file. Defaults should suffice.

Config.Name: WebUIPortMap
Config.Description: The port to use for the web UI. Make sure to adjust the value both here AND in the WebUI setting above.
